attributes.action: We want he government to fund construction for wind farms in the Uk
attributes.additional_details:
It will not only help the environment, but it will also mean a better economy for the Uk as, 
we can sell the spare energy to other countries. We need to act on our careless acts in the past, while also going for a more successful and sustainable future.
attributes.background: We want he government to create a construction plan and fund it for wind farms in windy places in the UK. If we want the future to be in favour of us, we need to earn it. If the adults won't do anything then we have to.

rejection.details:
The Government already provides funding for wind farms. You can find out more about recent funding and future plans here:

Record number of renewables projects awarded government funding: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/record-number-of-renewables-projects-awarded-government-funding

Boost for offshore wind as government raises maximum prices in renewable energy auction: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/boost-for-offshore-wind-as-government-raises-maximum-prices-in-renewable-energy-auction

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to provide additional funding for wind farms, if that's what you want to happen.
